title: ettaik-kaNDu nI mInAkSi
sahitya:
ettaik-kaNDu nI mInAkSi indappaDi shilai pOlAnAi irundirundorup-pOrukk-
ezhundu munainda pOdup-porundu guNamillAdoru punnakaiyoDu nANamatura 


anupallavi

  cittam mayangiDak-kAlamO chI chI chI idenna kOlamO en 
attaiyAm kAncana mAlai arindiTTAl appuram ennenna nErumO


caraNam    ellAm veruttavan turavaram pUNDavan eLLADam ennA shenrAnAm inru adaip-
pOl un kAriyam AccEDi ediri eNNi naghaippAnAm koLLAp-pugazh enra guNamAnadu 
pulikkEdaDi kUDa vanda engaL paDaiyAnadu gelikkAdaDi taLLAdirundAlO jaya 
bhErikai olikkAdaDi taDAda kaip-pirATTiyaDi shaTrEnum en shork-kELaDi
tAm tarita tom tom tom tana tillAna kiTa tarikiTa tattajham taraNam
pa dha sa* ri ma ga ri sa ri gA pala taramuraiyadum uNarA 
gA ma ga ma ga tadIngiNatOm tarita jhaNuta tarita jhaNuta tA dhI tA 
kiTataka tarikiTatOm tA kiTataka tarikiTatOm kiTataka tarikiTatOm
